en: give things to someone to honor

ngiemboon: Peg tǒo cúʼtè, mbɔ́ntáʼ pʉa zɔ̌ gwɔ́ wó.
en: We came to the meeting, there were only a few people.

ngiemboon: Lelÿɔʼ mbɔɔ pʉa, é pú ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ jÿó.
en: Yam and even taro are all delicacies.

ngiemboon: À gʉ̌a tà ńtúm mbɔɔ ntse.
en: He even went so far as to cross a stream.

ngiemboon: Gʉa mbʉ̀a ńkaa mekáŋ mbɔɔ né mekʉŋ.
en: Go home and carry the plates with the pots.

ngiemboon: Mbɔɔ púʼu, à tsɔ́ mmó gie n ge ná, á té wó wɔ́.
en: Even so, I have nothing to give.
Sorry come on, we're going to the water!
The protector of humans is God.
musical instrument made by cutting notches in a raffia, scraped by a metal bar, used by dance groups Kanoon, Kwakwa, Ntsebe
He is the second in their house.
